# Intro to Data Types - Exercises

The following exercises serve as self-assessment of your prior knowledge.

Explore them to discover, recall or deepen your knowledge of basic Python structures and constructs.

- [**Beginner**](week_01_intro_to_data_types_beginner.qmd#exercises)
- [**Intermediate**](week_01_intro_to_data_types_intermediate.qmd#exercises)
- [**Advanced**](week_01_intro_to_data_types_advanced.qmd#exercises)

There is no requirement to succeed at all of them. Come back to these over time to check the progression of your understanding.
